channel.title: Sccm on credibleDEV
channel.description: Recent content in Sccm on credibleDEV

item.title: Intune Hardware Hash Import During Task Sequence
item.description: Easily collect and import the Intune device hardware hash using an SCCM task sequence while deploying Windows 10.

item.title: PowerShell Force Compliance Baseline Evaluation
item.description: Forcing a SCCM compliance rule is easy to do but you may not know how. This guide explains how PowerShell can be used to force this.
